column1: Weighted magnetic resonance image size (128, 256, 1) in T2, revealing the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°109 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5477.7832 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4392.7734 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 238.6230 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 537.8906 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1625.5371 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 390.2344 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 267.6270 mm³, the left putamen of volume 87.0117 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 129.1992 mm³, the brainstem of volume 104.1504 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 81.7383 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 77.7832 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 112.0605 mm³.

MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, of sagittal section. We observe slice n°109 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The following elements are present in the image: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5477.7832 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4392.7734 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 238.6230 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 537.8906 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1625.5371 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 390.2344 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 267.6270 mm³, the left putamen of volume 87.0117 mm³, the left globus pallidus of volume 129.1992 mm³, the brainstem of volume 104.1504 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 81.7383 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 77.7832 mm³ and the left ventral diencephalon of volume 112.0605 mm³.
